title: Honda Motorcycle & Scooter India to take on Royal Enfield
description: HMSI currently has two products - CB350 and CB350RS - in the mid-weight motorcycle segment. The company is targeting sales of 300,000 units per annum in the category in the next three years with the new portfolio of locally produced midsize motorcycles. To expand reach, HMSI - which currently has around 70 Big Wing outlets bikes - will expand presence to 300 customer touch points in the next three years.
